original_text: So come and join me for the night. We can lie in each other's arms. All night, we can enjoy as much sex as we like.
korean_text: 오라 우리가 아침까지 흡족하게 서로 사랑하며 사랑함으로 희락하자

sentences.original_text: So come and join me for the night.
We can lie in each other's arms.
All night, we can enjoy as much sex as we like.
sentences.korean_translation: 밤새도록 우리가 원하는 만큼 즐길 수 있어요.
